subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Joe Johnson tied the N.B.A. record for 3-pointers in a quarter, giving the Nets a much-needed win during a week when they can do some repair work on their record.
snippet: Joe Johnson tied the N.B.A. record for 3-pointers in a quarter, giving the Nets a much-needed win during a week when they can do some repair work on their record.
